alert.note: Alert for Hood; Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Parker, southeastern Palo Pinto and northwestern Hood Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brock, or 9 miles south of Mineral Wells, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brock, Lipan, Horseshoe Bend, Millsap, New Salem, Brock Junction, Bennett, Santo, Dennis and Brazos. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 377 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
